comment.body: actually you can [transvest](http://wiki.p2pfoundation.net/Transvestment) value into many fields that will reverse your footprint. for example: urban vertical farming cooperatives that allows food to be produced locally using existing infrastructure, or you could do your own ethical land grab, where you prevent desertification by only allowing regenerative practices to exploit the land such as permaculture agroecology or basically projects doing [food forests](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Forest_gardening)
